title: Improved Soundtrack
author: Fuar
detailed: Improves the in game soundtrack by adding new conditions to play rare or removed music tracks from the OST. Including new location discovered stingers.

title: Sky Co-op
author: Filigrani
dependence: ModSettings, KeyboardUtilities, ModComponent, LocalizationUtilities, GearSpawner, CraftingRevisions, IncreaseSaveSlotLimit
detailed: Multiplayer mod for the game

title: Improved Loading Screens
author: Fuar
detailed: A mod that improves the loading screens of the game with custom tips, background images and the ability to enable or disable various aspects of the loading screens.

title: Foods by 'Calorie Waltz'
author: Waltz
detailed: Adds 20+ unique, delicious food and beverage items. Insludes cute collectibles and handy settings!Installed by unpacking it into .../Mods/

title: Opguns
author: DeletedAccount
detailed: Makes gun op with infinite ammo and machine gun fire rates

title: AutoSave
author: Primadonna
detailed: Adds Quicksaves, exit saves, animal trigger saves, lots of saves.

title: Choose Starting Gear
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to choose your starting gear when starting a new game. Full instructions in the README.

title: Crafting Anywhere
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to remove the location requirements from craftable items (workbench, forge etc). Full instructions in the README.

title: Silent Protagonist
author: Cass
detailed: Silences player character voice. Full instructions in the README.

title: QuickPick
author: Primadonna
detailed: Improves UI for picking up objects. Includes Stickpick by Digitalzombie.

title: Snow Shelter Decay
author: Primadonna
detailed: Lets you adjust Snow Shelter Decay rate.

title: RevealMap
author: Primadonna
detailed: No more need for charcoal, everything is revealed automatically.

title: Choose Starting Conditions
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to choose your starting condition, fatigue, hunger, thirst, warmth, injuries and illnesses when starting a new game. Full instructions in the README.

title: Choose Starting Location
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to choose your starting location when starting a new Sandbox game. 300+ locations, all regions, all difficulty modes. Full instructions in the README.

title: Wolves Come Out At Night
author: Cass
detailed: Prevents wolves spawning during the day. Can set by region or to apply everywhere. Full instructions in the README.

title: Rest Max
author: Primadonna
detailed: Better sleep menu options.

title: Bedroll Tweaker
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to change the warmth, weight and decay of bedrolls. Allows bedroll warmth to 'stack' so extra bedrolls in your inventory can add additional warmth. Fully configurable. Full instructions in the README.

title: Clothing Tweaker
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to adjust the warmth, warmth when wet, waterproof, windproof, protection, mobility, weight and decay values of clothing items. Full instructions in the README.

title: ArrowMod
author: ttr
detailed: Allows to change duration of crafting arrow and arrowhead. Adds additionall crafting options for arrows.

title: Custom Settings Tweaker PRE-RELEASE
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to change and fine-tune several settings in a CUSTOM mode game (new or existing), such as Hunger, Thirst, Fatigue, Condition Recovery etc. This is a PRE-RELEASE VERSION for testing and feedback. Full instructions in the README.

title: Food Tweaker
author: Cass
detailed: Adjust: calories of food items; cooking time for meat and fish; how much meat shrinks when cooked (raw weight vs cooked weight); difference between weight of whole, raw fish vs cleaned, cooked fish; meat and fish will become 'Hot' after cooking; enable MRE self-heating; option to fix vanilla game error where tea & coffee provide incorrect hydration. Full instructions in the README.

title: House Basements
author: ds5678
detailed: Adds some more basements to the game.Patreon

title: Timberwolves Anywhere
author: ds5678
detailed: Allows the user to decide what type of wolves will spawn in a region.Patreon

title: Astrid_Makeover
author: Primadonna
detailed: Astrid's face in the paperdoll ui in the clothing menu is improved.

title: Home-Made Soup Redux
author: bushtail
detailed: undefined

title: Stretch Armstrong
author: bushtail
detailed: undefined

title: Small Fix To Scenes
author: stmSantana
detailed: This mod allows modifying some items in the mountaineer's hut (Timberwolf mountain).

title: Shelter Temperature Tweaks
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to tweak the temperature of shelters that have NO LOADING SCREEN, such as the Mountaineer's Hut. Full instructions in the README.

title: Container Tweaks
author: Cass
detailed: Allows you to change the capacity of containers. Separate settings for each type of container for granular control. Full instructions in the README.

title: Reroll Burnt Buildings
author: Cass
detailed: Adds console commands that allow you to reroll the random burnt building spawns. Now also includes the random fishing hut doors. Full instructions in the README.

title: Sun Orientation Fixes
author: Cass
detailed: Fixes the sun orientation in several regions. Now all regions should be consistent with each other and the world map.

title: DIY by Santana
author: stmSantana
dependence: ModComponent, ModSettings, GearSpawner, LocalizationUtilities, CraftingRevisions, Placing Anywhere
detailed: (ITEM MOD) Mod to add some craftable furniture.Move files in the downloaded ZIP to the Mods folder.Note: Zip files should not be moved to the Mods folder!

title: Vehicle Mod
author: NopirateOnlySteam
detailed: Vehicle Mod is about creating fun and useful vehicles. Every vehicle can be customised with different engines and wheels to change the speed and effective surfaces the vehicles can drive on.(IN FILE INFO.INI INSIDE ADDON FOLDER)

title: TLD-WolfskinScarf
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Adds a new craftable scarf made of wolf fur.

title: Interior wall decorations and My pictures
author: stmSantana
detailed: (ITEM MOD) Mod to decoration such as posters.Recommended mod: Placing Anywhere

title: FireAddons
author: ttr
detailed: Allows to use Lantern as fire starter, tinder can be used as fuel and tinder contribiute to firestarting buffs. Reworked embers and allows crafting flint. Details in readme on github.

title: Item Piles Mod
author: stmSantana
dependence: ModComponent, ModSettings, GearSpawner, LocalizationUtilities, CraftingRevisions, Placing Anywhere
detailed: (ITEM MOD) Mod to add some item piles.

title: Afraid of the Dark
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Makes the player anxious at night.

title: TLD-Cigarettes
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Adds usable Cigarettes

title: StruggleTweaks
author: ttr
detailed: Set chance to instantly kill wolf after struggle or change bleedout time for wolf. Also you can change tap power to save your mouse buttons

title: ToolsQuality
author: ttr
detailed: Keep Your tools sharp. Low condition of tool increase time to perform actions.

title: BringBackComponets
author: NopirateOnlySteam
detailed: Bring Back Component WheelCollider and HinjeJoint API FOR DEVELOPPERS !!!Only patching the components!!!

title: MapTweaks
author: ttr
detailed: Change time and range of map survey. Allows get vista bonus w/o polaroids

title: WarmFood
author: ttr
detailed: Adds warming Buff to cooked food and allows calories adjustment for each meat/fish type. Future sucessor: Food Tweaker

title: Unity Explorer
author: Sinai
detailed: An in-game UI for exploring, debugging, and modifying Unity games.

title: Story Mode Collectibles
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Adds collectible items from Wintermute into survival mode.

title: TLD-Morphine
author: Atlas Lumi
detailed: Adds Morphine as a usable item

title: ModComponent
author: ds5678
detailed: Utility Mod; lets you load external item packs.Patreon

title: ModSettings
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Lets other mods display their settings in-game. This mod doesn't do anything on its own and should only be used as a dependency for other mods.

title: Arrow Color Changer
author: stmSantana
detailed: You can change the color of the arrow.Note: Zip files should not be moved to the Mods folder!

title: How To Survive Book
author: stmSantana
detailed: Collectable books that increase all skill points are added to the game.

title: FireImprovements
author: Remodor
detailed: Configurable QoL mod all around fire. Including, remember last used fire item, better item sorting for fire starting, better torch/ flare support for fire starting, better torch usability outside of fire starting, configurable no-tinder penalty and no magic fire duration boost.

title: Foods by Santana
author: stmSantana
detailed: (ITEM MOD) Mod to add food such as ramen.Move the two files in the downloaded ZIP to the Mods folder.Note: Zip files should not be moved to the Mods folder!

title: Relentless Night
author: ShieldHeart
detailed: The spin of the earth is slowing. Days and nights are getting longer. Every long night gets colder and harsher than the last. Nowhere is safe from the cold. How long will you survive in this eerie new world?Mod Discord

title: Show Map Location
author: stmSantana
detailed: Displays the player icon on the map like in story mode.

title: AncientGatekeepersCraftingChanges
author: Ancient Gatekeeper
detailed: Allows the player to craft the Distress Pistol, Homemade Soup, & Renewable Herbal Tea. Installation Instructions

title: Bandage Overhaul
author: Kardyne
detailed: Makes bandages increase infection risk on open wounds unless sterilized beforehand.

title: Toilet Paper Mod
author: stmSantana
detailed: (ITEM MOD) Mod to add toilet paper.

title: WeaponImprovements
author: Remodor
detailed: Small configurable QoL mod which improves the weapon handling and adds the ability to interrupt the reloading process or disable the ammo hud.

title: Candlelight
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Adds candles and new materials to craft candles

title: MovableContainers
author: zorgesho
detailed: This mod allows to move some types of containers (inside one location and between locations)

title: RelativeConsumptionTime
author: Remodor
detailed: Small QoL mod which changes the absolute time for eating and drinking to a configurable relative time in proportion to the consumed amount. Now also includes relative durations for actions like waiting, harvesting, breaking down, etc.

title: AnimalBehavior
author: AlexTheRegentds5678Remodor
detailed: Let's you customize many animal behavior like fleeing duration, bleed out modifier, wolf behavior on aiming and many more, in addition to the included and enhanced TweakRabbits and DetectionRange. These mods are obsolete and have to be removed in order to use this mod!

title: Fireworks
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Adds fireworks to the flaregun

title: Quicker Harvesting
author: JoshuaAC
detailed: Changes how long harvestables take to harvest in The Long Dark.

title: Worst Gear First
author: deerie
detailed: With this mod Quick Access shortcuts and Pie Menu will choose worst condition items.

title: Ambient Lights
author: Xpazeman
detailed: This mod aims to modify the default lightning for interiors with windows, making them brighter so you don't need a light source during midday to move around, and also more reflective of what's happening outside (time of day, weather, and sun position).To install, extract zip contents in Mods folder. DO NOT LEAVE THE .ZIP FILE IN THE FOLDER.

title: StickPick [Legacy]
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Version not maintained anymore. Switch to QuickPick for updated functionality.

title: TLD Solitaire
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Waste your time in style - play Solitaire

title: Refilling Containers
author: deerie
detailed: After a given number of days refills containers with random items, allowing you to hoard forever.

title: AudioCore Plugin
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: A plugin that enables the standard Unity audio engine. Does nothing on it's own.

title: CacheControl
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Lets you decide how many Prepper Caches should spawn in custom mode games.

title: InterloperRegionSelection
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: This mod lets you select the spawn region in Interloper mode.

title: Alternate Blueprints
author: gamerFinn
detailed: Alternate Blueprints for the snare and arrowhead.

title: NoisemakerBlueprint
author: gamerFinn
detailed: A blueprint for the Noisemaker from Episode 4.

title: Renewable Coffee
author: gamerFinn
detailed: A mod that lets you craft a tin of coffee with a recycled can, prepared rosehips, and prepared reshi mushrooms

title: Workshop Bullet Crafting
author: gamerFinn
detailed: A mod for crafting bullets at workbenches.

title: Pastime Reading
author: Waltz
detailed: Adds a readable, customizable book with animations and stuff.Showcasing video. Detailed review(has subtitles).Mod is installed by extracting .zip into .../Mods/

title: Binoculars
author: ds5678
detailed: Lets you see farther.Installation InstructionsPatreon

title: Blanket Mod
author: ds5678
detailed: Add a warm blanket to the game. Also adds bedroll crafting.Patreon

title: Fire Pack
author: ds5678
detailed: Introduces a bowdrill and an ember box for carrying hot embers.Installation InstructionsPatreon

title: Food Pack
author: ds5678
detailed: Introduces 33 new food items.Installation InstructionsPatreon

title: JumpMod
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: Let's you jump

title: ExtraHotkeys
author: zorgesho
detailed: This mod adds additional hotkeys for equipping gear items

title: PlaceFromInventory
author: zorgesho
detailed: This mod allows to place items right from the inventory screen with a right mouse click. Also, it places any stackable items as one item (as stack).

title: SaveAnywhere
author: zorgesho
detailed: This mod allows to save and load anywhere in the survival mode like in the story mode. Also, it can disable permadeath.

title: Northfolk Clothing Pack
author: Waltz
detailed: Adds 2 previously seen + 3 brand new, inspired by northern folk, craftable clothes.It's a standard ModComponent pack, installed by dropping it into .../Mods/

title: EnableStatusBarPercentages
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: This mod re-enables some labels in the status / first aid screen that show a percentage value of how full the warmth, fatigue, thirst, hunger, and health status bars are.

title: HungerRevamped
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Improves the hunger system by separating hunger and stored calories.

title: Better Fuel Management
author: ds5678
dependence: ModComponent, ModSettings, KeyboardUtilities, RadialMenuUtilities, LocalizationUtilities, GearSpawner, CraftingRevisions
detailed: Makes kerosene management more realistic.Installation InstructionsPatreon

title: Better Water Management
author: ds5678
dependence: ModComponent, ModSettings, LocalizationUtilities, GearSpawner, CraftingRevisions, CustomSaveDataUtilities
detailed: Mod improving the way water is managed for The Long Dark.Installation InstructionsPatreon

title: Cannery Manufacturing
author: ds5678
detailed: Makes Bleak Inlet more useful, especially on Interloper.Installation InstructionsPatreon

title: Coordinates Grabber
author: ds5678
detailed: Utility mod. Allows you to see/copy the name, position, rotation, and scene of interactive items.Patreon

title: Crafting Hotkey
author: ds5678
detailed: Add a hotkey for the crafting menu.Patreon

title: Randomize Interloper Rare Spawns
author: ds5678
detailed: Disables the Interloper loot tables and replaces them with new random spawns. Do not use on existing saves.Installation InstructionsPatreon

title: Auto-Updating Plugin
author: ds5678
detailed: Plugin. Updates most mods automatically.Patreon

title: Alcohol Mod
author: ds5678
detailed: An optional addon for ModComponent enabling the alcohol mechanics. Without this, all alcoholic food functions as if it were non-alcoholic.Patreon

title: Forge Blueprints Mod
author: ds5678
detailed: Adds some blueprints for the forge.Installation InstructionsPatreon

title: Wooden Statuettes
author: ds5678
detailed: A cozy mod for The Long Dark.Installation InstructionsPatreon

title: Crafting Revisions
author: ds5678
detailed: Improves the Crafting UI and enables custom blueprint creation.Patreon

title: Custom Save Data Utilities
author: ds5678
detailed: Utility mod for custom save data on gear items.Patreon

title: Gear Spawner
author: ds5678
detailed: Utility mod for spawning modded items.Patreon

title: UseableMeatMod
author: JoshuaAC
detailed: Changes The Amount of Useable Meat Upon Killing an Animal in The Long Dark.

title: House Lights
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark that magically brings electricity back. You can turn lights on and off by using the light switches.v2.2

title: Kerosene Lamp Tweaks
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark to modify the rates of fuel consumption for kerosene lamps and the color they emit.

title: Placing Anywhere
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark that removes restrictions when placing items, and adds controls to rotate and position the object.Requires ModSettings and KeyboarUtilities to work

title: Random main Menu
author: Xpazeman
detailed: This mod randomizes the time and weather in the main menu screen so it changes everytime you enter it.

title: Remove Clutter
author: Xpazeman
detailed: This mods allows you to remove most of the clutter in TLD.To install, extract zip contents in Mods folder. DO NOT LEAVE THE .ZIP FILE IN THE FOLDER.

title: WorkingClocks
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark that makes some of the clocks in the game work.

title: Better Night Sky
author: ds5678
detailed: Makes the night sky more realistic.Patreon

title: Localization Utilities
author: ds5678
detailed: Utility mod for localized text.Patreon

title: Alternative Action Utilities
author: ds5678
detailed: Utility mod for custom mouse clicks.Patreon

title: FoxCompanion
author: Digitalzombie
detailed: A little fox companion for the lonely TLD player.

title: Festive-Pack
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds items to make the game look festive.

title: ClothingBlueprints
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds the ability to craft any clothing item.

title: Better Stacking
author: ds5678
detailed: Makes more items stackable in the inventory.Patreon

title: TLD-Bugfixes
author: zeobviouslyfakeaccds5678
detailed: This mod fixes some old bugs and known exploits in *The Long Dark*.

title: Darker Nights
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark to make nights darker, giving a new challenge.

title: Prison-Pack
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds prison clothing to the game.

title: CookWhileFishing
author: zorgesho
detailed: This mod allows to cook the catched fish automatically without interruption of the fishing

title: Bleeding Revamped
author: Deus
detailed: Reworkes the bleeding mechanics of wildlife.

title: Maintain Yourself
author: Deus
detailed: This adds options to customize condition gain. This can make condition recovery much harder or easier, by making recovery proportional to your needs.

title: Non-OP Torches
author: Deus
detailed: This mod makes torches less overpowered.

title: Disable Cabin Fever
author: ds5678
detailed: Disables Cabin Fever in all game modes.Patreon

title: Extreme Temperature Drop
author: ds5678
detailed: Alters temperature degradation.Patreon

title: Skip Intro
author: ds5678
detailed: Allows the player to skip to the main menu when starting the game.Patreon

title: Sonic Mod
author: ds5678
detailed: Lets you sprint up to 30 times faster and control other movement characteristics.Patreon

title: ShorterReadingIntervals
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: A mod that lets you research for shorter amounts of time and lets you interrupt research at any time without losing progress.

title: Archery Target Practice
author: ds5678
detailed: Allows the player to level up their archery skill at the archery target in Pleasant Valley. Only works for levels 1 and 2.Patreon

title: MooseSatchelMod
author: ttr
detailed: Reduce scent and decay for meat, fish and guts, if using Moose Bag

title: DeveloperConsole
author: FINDarksidezeobviouslyfakeaccds5678
detailed: A mod that makes Hinterland's developer console accessible in-game. F1 to open / close the console, type 'help' to get a list of commands.

title: Infinity Fires
author: ds5678
detailed: Right click on a fire to make it last forever.Patreon

title: Read When Hungry
author: ds5678
detailed: Allows you to read when you might not be able to otherwise.Patreon

title: More Workbenches
author: ds5678
detailed: Adds a few more workbenches to the game.Patreon

title: Keyboard Utilities
author: ds5678
detailed: A utility mod that enables other mods to more easily use keyboard and mouse input.Patreon

title: Bleak Bridge
author: ds5678
detailed: Add a bridge to the Cannery Workshop.Patreon

title: Time Accelerator
author: ds5678
detailed: Allows the player to speed up time without changing the game difficulty.Patreon

title: Clothing Pack
author: ds5678
detailed: Introduces several clothing items including a new Beanie Cap.Installation InstructionsPatreon

title: Radial Menu Utilities
author: ds5678
detailed: A utility mod that adds the ability for other mods to create custom radial menus.Patreon

title: Better Mending Experience
author: MikeyPdogds5678
detailed: Modifies the Mending System to give skill points for crafting.Patreon

title: Agriculture
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds the ability to farm in The Long Dark

title: Bedtime-Stories
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds a mini story in mystery lake.

title: NewWorldFoods
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds new food items to the game world.

title: StoneTools
author: TheDevv
detailed: Adds the ability to create stone tools in tld.

title: Toggle HUD
author: ds5678
detailed: Allows the player to toggle the scent and time-of-day indicators instead of them disappearing after some time.Patreon

title: Ankle-Support
author: WulfMariuszeobviouslyfakeaccRemodor
detailed: Mod which fixes sprain bugs in TLD and adds configurable sprain support for wrists and ankles.

title: Limitless Container Space
author: ds5678
detailed: Raises the capacity on all containers to 10,000 kilograms.Patreon

title: Weapon Crosshair
author: ds5678
detailed: Allows the player to reenable the crosshair while aiming.Patreon

title: Custom Whiteout
author: ds5678
detailed: Custom Whiteout Challenge. Allows the player to set the items to be gathered and the place to gather items to.Patreon

title: Map Maker Tools
author: ds5678
detailed: Mod aiding in mapping the terrain for The Long Dark

title: Quick Witted
author: ds5678
detailed: Lets you level up individual skills fasterPatreon

title: Disable-Camera-Sway
author: WulfMariuszeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Prevents the automatic camera rotation that happens when the player does not move their mouse for some time.

title: Beachcombing Adjustments
author: ds5678
detailed: Lets you change the loot table for beachcombing.Patreon

title: Silent Aurora
author: ds5678
detailed: Removes the aurora music, including the radio. Does not affect the humming/crackling of electronics.Patreon

title: Increase Save Slot Limit
author: ds5678
detailed: Increases the save slot limit to 999 instead of the default 25.Patreon

title: Gear Decay Modifier
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark to modify decay rates of gear.If you have issues with 1.95, try deleting GearDecayModifier.json from the Mods folder (this will delete your settings).

title: QuickerWoodCutting
author: ttr
detailed: Change time needed to chop wood

title: SaveImageFilter
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Saves and reloads your chosen image filter (Options > Display > Image Filter) instead of reverting to 'no filter' every time the game is restarted.

title: TinCanImprovements
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Allows you to craft 4 tin cans into 1 scrap metal, reduces the weight of tin cans to 0.05 kg, fixes a canned food item weight bug.

title: DurableMaintainance
author: OceanMan
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark to provide settings to allow you to modify decay rates of maintainance tools, like the whetstone.

title: FasterSearching
author: MikeyPdogzeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Speeds up the search action on containers and makes searching instant for empty containers.

title: RememberBreakDownItem
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: This mod remembers the tool you last used to break down objects such as branches or curtains to make the UI less annoying.

title: Indoor Campfires
author: Xpazeman
detailed: This mod allows you to create campfires indoors.

title: Weight Tweaks
author: Xpazeman
detailed: Mod for The Long Dark to modify item weights and carry capacity.

title: DisableBreathEffect
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Removes the annoying 2D breath cloud that appears every few seconds when it's cold.

title: DisableChromaticAberration
author: WulfMariuszeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Completely disables chromatic aberration for all quality modes. Works with existing games.

title: EnableFeatProgressInCustomMode
author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: The v1.29 update turned off feat progress in custom mode games - this mod turns it back on.

title: FreeLookInCars
author: WulfMariuszeobviouslyfakeacc
detailed: Allows looking out of the back window in cars.
